data.title: Charles City County
data.meta_description: CVWMA serves Central Virginia with curbside and drop-off recycling, solid waste collection, electronics recycling, household hazardous waste disposal and more.
data.meta_site_name: CVWMA - CVWMA serves Central Virginia with curbside and drop-off recycling, solid waste collection, electronics recycling, household hazardous waste disposal and more.
data.text:
Chambers Road Landfill (Charles City Landfill)

8000 Chambers Road, Charles City

Monday-Friday, 5:30 a.m.-9 p.m.

Saturday-Sun 7 a.m.-8 p.m.

Munford Road Convenience Center

15000 Munford Road, Providence Forge

Monday, Wednesday and Friday, 9 a.m.-4:30 p.m.

Tuesday and Thursday, 7 a.m.-7 p.m.

Saturday, 8 a.m.-noon

Closed Sunday

Holdcroft Convenience Center

11901 Wilcox Neck Road, Charles City
